GSD.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the HTML Manager Interface in Apache Tomcat 5.5 before 5.5.32, 6.0 before 6.0.30, and 7.0 before 7.0.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML, as demonstrated via the display-name tag.

product_data.product_name: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Web Server 1 for RHEL 5
Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Web Server 1 for RHEL 6

description_data.value: CVE-2011-0013 tomcat: XSS vulnerability in HTML Manager interface

description.value: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

description_data.value: CVE-2011-0013 tomcat: XSS vulnerability in HTML Manager interface
